response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We believe this is a fair opportunity for both parties, allowing you to acquire a premium product at a competitive rate. Should you be interested in this offer, please let us know, and we'll proceed with the transaction without delay. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
